FuncDef:
The multicast bas-policy command creates a multicast BAS policy and displays the policy view.
The undo multicast bas-policy command deletes the multicast BAS policy.
By default, no multicast BAS policy is created.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To configure a multicast BAS policy and display the policy view, run the multicast bas-policy command. In the BAS policy view, you can configure a multicast bandwidth limit policy.
Precautions
Before deleting BAS policy views using the undo multicast bas-policy command, you must delete all multicast bandwidth limit policies configured in the BAS policy views. Otherwise, the undo multicast bas-policy command fails to be run.This command is supported only on the admin VS.
